message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick to my original offer of $10,000. I hope we can reach a mutual agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your firm stance, but I'm confident this product is worth more than your offer.  I can't go below $11,000 and still feel good about this deal.
Hello Alice, I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of the product. However, I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price. I am unable to increase my offer further.
